results.title: Rare case of diabetic neuropathic cachexia along with diabetic amyotrophy.
results.text_hl: A 65-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with background of @CHEMICAL_Alcohols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000438 @@@alcohol@@@ excess and previous @DISEASE_Wounds_Gunshot @DISEASE_MESH:D014948 @@@gunshot wounds@@@ was admitted with significant @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, @DISEASE_Muscle_Cramp @DISEASE_MESH:D009120 @@@leg cramps@@@, @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Lethargy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053609 @@@lethargy@@@ for the last 3 months.

results.title: Occult metformin toxicity in three patients with profound lactic acidosis.
results.text_hl: Hemodialysis was initiated when it was revealed that she took @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ daily. She improved rapidly and a @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ level was 27.4 mug/mL.

results.title: Pituitary gigantism presenting with depressive mood disorder and diabetic ketoacidosis in an Asian adolescent.
results.text_hl: He was then administered @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, 500 mg twice daily, and to date, his serum glycohemoglobin has been <7%.
